Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    javax.portlet.PortletRequest.getParameter(String)
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.PortletRequestWrapper.getParameter(String)
    javax.portlet.PortletRequest.getParameterMap()
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.BaseURL.getParameterMap()
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters(), ResourceURL.getResourceParameters(), or ActionURL.getActionParameters() as required.
    javax.portlet.filter.PortletRequestWrapper.getParameterMap()
    javax.portlet.PortletRequest.getParameterNames()
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.PortletRequestWrapper.getParameterNames()
    javax.portlet.PortletRequest.getParameterValues(String)
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.PortletRequestWrapper.getParameterValues(String)
    javax.portlet.PortletRequest.getPrivateParameterMap()
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.PortletRequestWrapper.getPrivateParameterMap()
    javax.portlet.ResourceRequest.getPrivateRenderParameterMap()
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.ResourceRequestWrapper.getPrivateRenderParameterMap()
    javax.portlet.PortletRequest.getPublicParameterMap()
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.PortletRequestWrapper.getPublicParameterMap()
    javax.portlet.StateAwareResponse.getRenderParameterMap()
    As of version 3.0. Use MutablePortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.EventResponseWrapper.getRenderParameterMap()
    javax.portlet.filter.ActionResponseWrapper.getRenderParameterMap()
    javax.portlet.StateAwareResponse.removePublicRenderParameter(String)
    As of version 3.0. Use MutablePortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.PortletURL.removePublicRenderParameter(String)
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.EventResponseWrapper.removePublicRenderParameter(String)
    javax.portlet.filter.ActionResponseWrapper.removePublicRenderParameter(String)
    javax.portlet.BaseURL.setParameter(String, String...)
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters(), ResourceURL.getResourceParameters(), or ActionURL.getActionParameters() as required.
    javax.portlet.BaseURL.setParameter(String, String)
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters(), ResourceURL.getResourceParameters(), or ActionURL.getActionParameters() as required.
    javax.portlet.BaseURL.setParameters(Map)
    As of version 3.0. Use PortletState.getRenderParameters(), ResourceURL.getResourceParameters(), or ActionURL.getActionParameters() as required.
    javax.portlet.StateAwareResponse.setRenderParameter(String, String...)
    As of version 3.0. Use MutablePortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.EventResponseWrapper.setRenderParameter(String, String...)
    javax.portlet.filter.ActionResponseWrapper.setRenderParameter(String, String...)
    javax.portlet.StateAwareResponse.setRenderParameter(String, String)
    As of version 3.0. Use MutablePortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.EventResponseWrapper.setRenderParameter(String, String)
    javax.portlet.filter.ActionResponseWrapper.setRenderParameter(String, String)
    javax.portlet.EventResponse.setRenderParameters(EventRequest)
    As of version 3.0. Use MutablePortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.EventResponseWrapper.setRenderParameters(EventRequest)
    javax.portlet.StateAwareResponse.setRenderParameters(Map)
    As of version 3.0. Use MutablePortletState.getRenderParameters() instead.
    javax.portlet.filter.EventResponseWrapper.setRenderParameters(Map)
    javax.portlet.filter.ActionResponseWrapper.setRenderParameters(Map)
